# archiveExtension

**Type Property**

The standard filename extension for exported [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceObject] instances.

## Declaration

```swift
class let archiveExtension: String
```

## Discussion

Use this filename extension when constructing a URL to save a reference object file with the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceObject/export(to:previewImage:)] method.

## Saving Recorded Objects

- **export(to:previewImage:)**: Writes a binary representation of the object to the specified file URL.

items.description: Writes a binary representation of the object to the specified file URL.
